email_body: TECHNOLOGY ALERT from The Wall Street Journal Oct. 18, 2001 AFTER SERVING UP boring banners for years, online publishers and advertisers are getting creative. The banner ad is "the biggest mistake we've ever made," says one member of our roundtable discussion, in the first of a series of articles on the new-media industry.
